sentences.en: After two hours'heavy fighting, we bore down the enemy's resistance.
sentences.cn: 经过两小时的激战, 我们粉碎了敌人的抵抗.

sentences.en: An aircraft has to overcome the resistance of the air.
sentences.cn: 飞机须克服空气的阻力.

sentences.en: Copper has less resistance to electricity than lead.
Diamonds have extreme resistance to abrasion.
Rebel gunmen have put up strong resistance.
sentences.cn: 持枪的叛乱分子负隅顽抗。

sentences.en: The aircraft is streamlined to cut down wind resistance.
sentences.cn: 飞机设计成流线型以减小风的阻力.

sentences.en: The army controls the city apart from a few pockets of resistance.
sentences.cn: 除了一些零星的抵抗外，部队已控制了城市。

sentences.en: The body is stimulated to build up resistance.
sentences.cn: 刺激身体以增强抵抗力。

sentences.en: The infantry divisions mopped up remaining centres of resistance.
sentences.cn: 陆军各师肃清了残余的抵抗据点。

sentences.en: The invasion was held up by unexpectedly stout resistance.
sentences.cn: 入侵行动因遭遇到了出乎意料的顽强抵抗而受阻。

sentences.en: The reduction in white blood cell counts lowers resistance to disease.
sentences.cn: 白细胞总数的减少,会降低对疾病的抵抗力.

sentences.en: The salt reduces the electrical resistance of the water.
The U.S. wants big cuts in European agricultural export subsidies, but this is meeting resistance.
sentences.cn: 美国想要在欧洲农业出口补贴上的大幅度削减，但这正遭遇抵制。

sentences.en: The world was electrified by his courage and resistance.
sentences.cn: 世人为他的勇气和反抗精神震惊不已。

sentences.en: There is lowered pain tolerance, lowered resistance to infection.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的忍耐力降低了，对感染的抵抗力也减弱了。

sentences.en: They managed to escape after being arrested by the resistance.
sentences.cn: 他们被抵抗组织抓住后又设法逃脱了。

sentences.en: They perceived that the enemy was trying to wear down their resistance.
sentences.cn: 他们明白敌人是想用消耗的办法来制服他们的抵抗.

words.tran_cn: 无抵抗力的；无法抗拒的
[电] 电阻率；抵抗力；电阻系数
阻力；[电]电阻；[力]抵抗；[法]反抗；抵抗力

phrases.tran_cn: 抗火性，耐火性（能）；抗燃烧性
抗胰岛素性；胰岛素耐受性
耐冲击性；耐震强度；耐冲辉；冲昏力

phrases.phrase: the line (或 path) of least resistance

phrases.tran_cn: 热阻；热变电阻，热敏电阻

trans.tran_en: a refusal to accept new ideas or changes
